name: Crypt of the Pharaoh
overview: You are in the Pharaoh's tomb. You must collect al the gold coins and get out of the tomb as fast as you can. This won't be easy because the tomb is haunted by the ghost of the Pharaoh's architect. You can choose two different skill levels for additional challenge in this 1983 collect'em up game. The tomb is a maze with golden coins in all the passageways. You must move through the maze collecting the coins. A ghost appears, causing the doors to change position. You cannot escape 'til you have all the coins.
